body_html:
Hey @geoHeil , could you show me what paths you've got? I'm getting the exact same error as you, but I also have cudnn downloaded and installed.

$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib/
admin 33 Mar 3 17:36 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.1.dylib -> /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.dylib
wheel 13504 Jan 11 20:31 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.dylib
wheel 45 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudadevrt.a -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudadevrt.a
wheel 50 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib
wheel 46 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.dylib -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.dylib
wheel 49 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart_static.a -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart_static.a
admin 36 Mar 3 17:37 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5 -> /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5.dylib
admin 76280680 Feb 24 16:32 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5.dylib
admin 76280680 Feb 24 16:32 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.dylib
admin 64702864 Feb 24 16:32 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn_static.a

$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib/
admin        33 Mar  3 17:36 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.1.dylib -> /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.dylib

body:
Hey @geoHeil , could you show me what paths you've got? I'm getting the exact same error as you, but I also have cudnn downloaded and installed. 

`$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib/`
`admin        33 Mar  3 17:36 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.1.dylib -> /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.dylib`
`wheel     13504 Jan 11 20:31 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.dylib`
`wheel        45 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudadevrt.a -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudadevrt.a`
`wheel        50 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib`
`wheel        46 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.dylib -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.dylib`
`wheel        49 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart_static.a -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart_static.a`
`admin        36 Mar  3 17:37 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5 -> /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5.dylib`
`admin  76280680 Feb 24 16:32 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5.dylib`
`admin  76280680 Feb 24 16:32 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.dylib`
`admin  64702864 Feb 24 16:32 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn_static.a`
